name: crystal of fire 2
description:
play as Kaito's younger Eirc brother as he try's to save he's brother form

the evil world that the  cult  of slmenton trapped him in ...

Now there is two way you can play the air way or the ship both have to side of the

ENJOY playing the game as you try to save the world and your brother
